title: Charles by the grace of God, King of Great Britaine ... forsomuch as our Estates of our kingdome of Scotland conveened in our generall convension holden at our pallace of Haly-rude-house, vpon the 28 day of Iulij ... haue made a free and willing offer of a yearelie extra-ordinarie taxation of the twentie pennie ...
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
notes: Second pt. of title from text.
"Giuen vnder our signet at our pallace of Haly-rude-house the 28 day of Iulij and of our raigne the sixt yeare, 1630."
Reproduction of original in the Town House (Aberdeen, Scotland). Charter Room.
